actions.name: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token
actions.title: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token

properties.display_name: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token

properties.description:
This workflow takes a CRUD atomic actions of SMXD to raise the risk score of an observable and issue an individual judgement
as well as response actions depending on the observable type and judgement disposition.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target


Steps:
[] Validate that the observable type is supported by SMXD
[] Search for the observable
[]> If found, raise the score of the observable
[]> If not found, create the observable in SMXD with a score of 1
[] Start to process the judgement promotion
[] Generate an access token for SXTR
[] Convert risk score into a judgement
[]> If the judgement changed, run the response actions

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd

properties.description:
This workflow takes a CRUD atomic actions of SMXD to lower the risk score of an observable and issue an individual judgement
as well as response actions depending on the observable type and judgement disposition.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target


Steps:
[] Validate that the observable type is supported by SMXD
[] Search for the observable
[]> If found, lower the score of the observable
[] Start to process the judgement promotion
[] Generate an access token for SXTR
[] Convert risk score into a judgement
[]> If the judgement changed, run the response actions

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd

properties.name: decrement
properties.description:
Set to 6 to set to clean disposition 
"Do not modify"

This workflow takes a CRUD atomic actions of SMXD to exclude an observable and issue an individual judgement
as well as response actions depending on the observable type and judgement disposition.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target


Steps:
[] Validate that the observable type is supported by SMXD
[] Search for the observable
[]> If found, set the score of the observable to exclude (0)
[]> If not found, create the observable in SMXD with a score of 0
[] Start to process the judgement promotion
[] Generate an access token for SXTR
[] Convert risk score into a judgement

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd
